title: Bulls
brief_description: Adaptation of an Alan Marshall story of a young girl’s isolation on a remote dairy farm, set in the late 1930s. Atmospheric, this production adds another dimension to the Marshall piece, although it lacks the “Laurentian” dimension of “Boys and girls”.
